Key Match Events: Kallman scored an own goal at 37'
Kallman received a yellow card at 25'
Peltola received a yellow card at 90+4'
Pre-Game Insights: Greece welcome Finland to the Georgios Karaiskakis Stadium in Piraeus on matchday one of the new UEFA Nations League campaign
This will be Greece's first-ever match in League B after winning promotion from the third tier in 2022
New manager Ivan Jovanovic has replaced Gus Poyet
Finland earned a Euro 2024 playoff place thanks to their performance in the previous Nations League
Miscellaneous Highlights: National team attendances have not been fantastic for Greece of late, as less than 200 saw them beat New Zealand last November
